guru.ttslib
Class StereoAudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
  guru.ttslib.StereoAudioPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.speech.freetts.audio.AudioPlayer
public class StereoAudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.speech.freetts.audio.AudioPlayer

a stereo streaming audio player. Its based on the StreamingAudioPlayer from the freetts package. Instead of the original AudioPlayer the audioStream is reused between the textparts.
